citations.narrative:
There are accumulations of fines from the pelleted feed and debris in the troughs of the self-feeders in several of the
guinea pig enclosures. Accumulation of fines and debris can affect the health of the guinea pigs. The self-feeders must be
kept clean and shall be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks to protect the health of the animals. Correct by February 5,
2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.29(d) 
   
Feeding. 
There are accumulations of fines from the pelleted feed and debris in the troughs of the self-feeders in several of the 
guinea pig enclosures. Accumulation of fines and debris can affect the health of the guinea pigs. The self-feeders must be 
kept clean and shall be sanitized at least once every 2 weeks to protect the health of the animals. Correct by February 5, 
2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
